mapper.select: SELECT vi.UUID, vi.CODE, vi.TITLE, vi.ISSUE_TYPE, vi.PRIORITY, vi.VERSION_CODE, date_format(Vi.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') UPDATE_TIME, su.NICKNAME CREATE_USER, vi.STATE, su2.nickname PRINCIPAL FROM v_issue vi LEFT JOIN s_users su ON su.username = vi.create_user LEFT JOIN s_users su2 ON su2.username = vi.principal WHERE 1=1 AND vi.object_code = #{object_code} AND ((vi.STATE in ('1','3') AND vi.principal = #{principal}) OR (vi.STATE in ('0','5','7') AND vi.create_user = #{principal}) OR (vi.STATE = '4' AND 1=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM p_role_user pru WHERE pru.object_code = #{object_code} AND pru.USERNAME = #{principal} AND pru.ROLE_ID = 'tester'))) ORDER BY vi.update_time DESC

SELECT t.uuid, 'T' issue_type, t.task_code issue_code, t.object_code, t.model_code, t.title, t.description, t.principal, u1.nickname principal_user_name, t.parent_code, t.version_code, t.priority, t.working_day, date_format(t.deadline, '%Y-%m-%d') deadline, t.state, t.is_read, t.is_enable, date_format(t.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') create_time, t.create_user, u2.nickname create_user_name FROM t_task t LEFT JOIN s_users u1 ON u1.username = t.principal AND u1.isenable = '1' LEFT JOIN s_users u2 ON u2.username = t.create_user AND u2.isenable = '1' WHERE t.uuid = #{uuid}

SELECT t.uuid, 'B' issue_type, t.bug_code issue_code, t.object_code, t.model_code, t.title, t.description, t.principal, u1.nickname principal_user_name, t.parent_code, t.version_code, t.priority, t.bug_level, t.result, date_format(t.deadline, '%Y-%m-%d') deadline, t.state, t.is_read, t.is_enable, date_format(t.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') create_time, t.create_user, u2.nickname create_user_name FROM t_bug t LEFT JOIN s_users u1 ON u1.username = t.principal AND u1.isenable = '1' LEFT JOIN s_users u2 ON u2.username = t.create_user AND u2.isenable = '1' WHERE t.uuid = #{uuid}
select model_code from s_model where object_code = #{objectId};
SELECT t.uuid, t.file_name, t.file_size, t.file_type, date_format(t.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') create_time, t.create_user FROM t_file t WHERE t.isenable = '1' AND business_id = #{businessId};
select t.file_name from t_file t WHERE t.uuid = #{uuid};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_push ( uuid, business_id, issue_type, model_code, description, create_user, create_time, push_state, isenable ) VALUES ( #{uuid,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{businessId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{issueType,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{model_code,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{create_user,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, sysdate(), '0', '1' );
